subject: Re: Correction Rosemary NOT Helen
author: g.guzzi
full_text:
Just for the record, it was Rosemary Ellen Guiley.




--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "debra.yeung" <debra.yeung@...> wrote:
>
> Rosemary Gurley Brown, 
> sorry Rosemary - wherever you may be.  Names are terrible with me.  I was so frustrated I had fallen asleep before I heard her interview, but glad that George Noory treats her well.
> (I really enjoyed her interview she had about the Queen Mary on C2C. It was a good one, again factual and just plain down to Earth)
> Deb
>
